hero.desc_strong: Turn your flyers, drives and PDFs into your optimized digital space to get MORE BOOKINGS, in 48 hours, hassle-free.
hero.desc:
Gather your bio, music, sets, dates, releases, rider and photos in a single link that speaks for you to bookers and agencies.

Community, clarity and status in every click.

theProblem.title:
The problem we
all know
theProblem.subtitle:
Bookers decide in 5 seconds.
If your presentation isn’t clear, you already lost.

left.title: Your current reality:
left.item5: Losing gigs due to poor presentation.

bottom.title: HOW MANY GIGS HAVE YOU ALREADY LOST?
bottom.desc: Every day with a sloppy presentation is a lost opportunity. Bookers don’t wait. Your competition already has everything sorted.

cta.title:
Your community

is waiting for you
cta.subtitle: Ready to start?
cta.desc: Attract bookers, labels and fans with a presskit that speaks for you. Unify your communication and step into the new standard.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear your doubts about our professional presskit service

capsules.genesis_description: The first concept. A starting point. Genesis is not just a set of websites; it’s the beginning of a new way of showing yourself with clarity and professionalism. From random links to purposeful branding. This is where the idea of DJ Presskit as a community and standard was born.

soundcloud.text:
DJ Presskit is officially supported by SoundCloud.

A trusted partnership to elevate your music presence.

footer.slogan: A DJ WHO RESPECTS HIMSELF HAS A PRESSKIT.
footer.description: Making every client feel valued—no matter the size of your audience.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: No technical headaches. We set it up, you focus on your music.

step1.title: Quick diagnosis
step1.description: 15–20 min meeting to understand your situation and guide you properly.

step2.title: Content upload
step2.description:
We send you a simple form. Upload photos, bio, links, rider, etc...
We organize everything.

step3.title:
Delivery in

48 hrs
step3.description: In less than 48 hrs we have your presskit ready and make 1-to-1 revisions with you before launching.

step4.title: Launch
step4.description: Your presskit is ready to start sharing, put in your bio and present yourself with a single link.

includes.title:
What’s included

in your presskit
includes.subtitle: Stop losing opportunities: A design made for bookers that turns your music into gigs.

bio.title: Professional Bio
bio.description: <underline>No more messy texts</underline>: your story is presented short, clear and in multiple languages, ready to close bookings.

gigs.title: Updated Gigs
gigs.description: <underline>No more excuses like ‘we don’t see activity’</underline>: your calendar syncs automatically and shows past and upcoming dates in real time.

media.title: Media
media.description: <underline>No more scattered links</underline>: your latest tracks and sets appear integrated from SoundCloud and YouTube with a professional look.

lanzamientos.title: Releases
lanzamientos.description: <underline>No more lost emails</underline>: your recent and upcoming releases are listed in one place, with quick access to listen and share.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: <underline>No more pixelated WhatsApp pics</underline>: your gallery is dynamic, optimized and shows you with the quality you deserve.

rider.title: Technical Rider
rider.description: <underline>Avoid technical misunderstandings</underline>: your rider is clear and accessible so the team knows exactly what you need in the booth.

contact.title: Direct Contact
contact.description: <underline>Cut the friction</underline>: your contact info and booking links are visible, no detours or barriers for the booker.

seo.title: Technical SEO
seo.description: <underline>Let them also find you organically</underline>: your presskit is optimized for search engines and attracts interest organically.

note.title: Optimized for bookers
note.description: Each element is designed so every booker, agency or promoter quickly finds what they need to book you at their next event.

comparison.title: Before vs After
comparison.subtitle: The difference between <red>losing opportunities</red> and <green>securing bookings</green>.

result.after: RESULT: Bookers remember and contact you.

cta.title: WHICH ONE DO YOU WANT TO BE IN?
cta.subtitle: The decision is in your hands. Keep losing opportunities or start closing gigs.

before.1: Generic bio that doesn’t communicate or position you.
before.2: Broken or scattered links that turn people off.
before.3: No calendar: bookers don’t see activity.

after.1: Precise bio that defines and sells your style.
after.2: Everything in one single unified link.
after.3: Synced calendar that shows your real dates.
after.4: Optimized gallery that boosts your professional image.
after.5: A single centralized presskit with everything accessible.
after.6: Professional presence that generates trust and bookings.

whyCapsules.title:
Why exclusive
capsules?
whyCapsules.subtitle: Capsules are LIMITED Presskit designs that guarantee exclusivity and professional status.

step1.title: Guaranteed exclusivity
step1.description: LIMITED number of DJs per capsule. Once it’s full, it closes forever. Your design will be unique in your region.

step2.title: Immediate differentiation
step2.description: While others use generic templates and PDFs, you have a premium design that reflects your professional level.

step3.title: Professional status
step3.description: Bookers instantly recognize quality. Your Presskit speaks seriousness before you say a word.

reviews.title: What our DJs say
reviews.subtitle: Real testimonials from DJs who already started professionalizing.

guaranteeBanner.title: 14-Day Satisfaction Guarantee
guaranteeBanner.desc: If you’re not 100% satisfied with your presskit during the first 14 days: We’ll refund all your money.
guaranteeBanner.note: After 14 days, additional changes carry a maintenance fee.

pricing.title: Plans & Pricing
pricing.subtitle: One-time investment that pays for itself with the first gig you land.

base.10: Drive folder connected to your Presskit.

addons.title: Optional extras
addons.subtitle: Boost your Presskit with the following options:

point1.desc: Exclusive capsule that sets you apart
